name: S&E doctorate holders employed in academia, by type of position, degree field, and citizenship: 2019
description: S&E doctorate holders employed in academia, by type of position, degree field, and citizenship: 2019

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_foreign_born_naturalized_u_s_citizens
variableMeasured.description: Foreign Born Naturalized U S Citizens

notes: Academic employment is limited to U.S. doctorate holders employed at 2- or 4-year colleges or universities, medical centers, and university research institutes. Physical sciences include earth, atmospheric, and ocean sciences; life sciences include biological, agricultural, and environmental life and health sciences. Detail may not add to total because of rounding.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Doctorate Recipients (SDR), 2019.Science and Engineering Indicators
